text: Maria Sol Muñoz (born 6 December 1975) is an Ecuadorian lawyer, and a member of the FIFA Council, where she represents the Confederación Sudamericana de Fútbol (Conmebol). Muñoz was born in Ecuador on 6 December 1975. Muñoz is the first woman to represent South America before FIFA Council. ==References== Category:FIFA officials Category:Football in Ecuador Category:Living people Category:1975 births
title: Maria Sol Muñoz
